jobInfo.postDescription: 爱安德技研贸易（上海）有限公司是一家外商独资企业。现在因公司业务发展需要，汽车测试设备部门需要招聘一名应用工程师。岗位职责与具体要求如下：汽车测试设备部门主页：http://www.aanddtech.comMain responsibilities:主要职责1. Understand and analyze customer's job requirements能够理解并分析客户的技术要求2. Field installation supervision and commisioning of AAT（automobile testing department) products/systems.负责现场安装指导和调试汽车测试部门产品/系统3. Create detailed specifications and applications development.创建详细的技术指标以及开发应用程序4. Support during integration and system validation in pre-acceptance支持预验收期间的系统集成和验证5. Communication and coordination with domestic/oversee venders与本地/海外供应商沟通及协调6. Carry out field service and maintenance work.实施现场服务和维保工作7. Support sales dept. in opportunity/project acquisition and technical related activities支持销售部门机遇/项目咨询以及技术相关活动Qualification：任职资格1. Bachelor degree or above in automobile, mechatronic, software system or similar majors汽车，汽车电子，软件等相关专业学士或以上学位者优先考虑2. Experience in automobile testing or related testing industry有汽车或相关测试行业经验者优先考虑3. Familiar with electricity drawing,VB,C language or software structure and functions will be a plus熟悉电气图纸，VB，C语言或软件结构和功能4. Willingness of travel能够适应国内外出差5. Good communication skills善于沟通，理解客户要求6.CET-4+, Excellent oral or written English and Microsoft office knowledge英语口语及书面语流利，擅长使用 Office软件
jobInfo.address: 上海浦东新区永华大厦(浦东大道)
